Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: the main difference is teachers understand the context of your work based off of the content from the unit. This is often more specific and tailored to the learning outcomes. AI, on the otherhand, gives feedback that is more general, which can be helpful for making sure writing is cohesive but not always helpful for nuanced perspectives

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: teachers are always more encouraging and a bit softer, you get the sense your teachers want you to succeed. Compared to AI that is a bit more blunt
